from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        remain = SortedList(range(n))
        res = []
        curr = n - 1
        for q in queries:
            i = remain.bisect_right(q[0])
            while i < len(remain) and remain[i] < q[1]:
                remain.pop(i)
                curr -= 1
            #print(q, remain, curr)
            res.append(curr)
        return res
